code.game.towers

Class TowerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • code.game.towers.TowerModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CastleAgeTower, CastleTower, FeudalAgeTower, ImperialTower, IndustrialTower

    public class TowerModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class defines the necessary properties of the tower and exposes methods to access and modify the tower objects.
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Umer, Lokesh

      • TowerModel

        public TowerModel(java.lang.String name,
                  int costoftower,
                  int upgradecost,
                  int refundvalue,
                  int rangeinblocks,
                  float powerofbullet,
                  int rateoffire)
        Constructor for defining an object of the tower model.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tower.
        costoftower - Cost for buying the tower.
        upgradecost - Upgrading cost.
        refundvalue - Refund amount.
        rangeinblocks - Range of the tower in blocks.
        powerofbullet - Power of the bullets.
        rateoffire - Interval at which tower fires the bullet.
